mapper.select: SELECT AA.* , BB.COMMON_CODE_NAME AS PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NAME , CC.COMMON_CODE_NAME AS PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NAME FROM ( SELECT A.* , MIN(B.COMMON_CODE) , B.PRODUCT_INVENTORY , C.COMMON_CODE_NAME FROM T_HMCT_PRODUCT A , T_HMCT_PRODUCT_OPTN B , T_HMCT_COMMON C WHERE A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO AND B.COMMON_CODE = C.COMMON_CODE group by A.PRODUCT_NO ) AA , ( SELECT * FROM T_HMCT_COMMON WHERE COMMON_TYPE = 'B' ) BB , ( SELECT * FROM T_HMCT_COMMON WHERE COMMON_TYPE = 'C' ) CC WHERE AA.PRODUCT_MATERIAL = BB.COMMON_CODE AND AA.PRODUCT_CATEGORY = CC.COMMON_CODE;
